Then we ran out of butter and used the coconut oil instead...it made the best snickerdoodles! Even on pancakes it's fabulous.
Started cooking healthy and coconut was a delicious way to go. This is a superb product. Highly recommend!

I have ordered this several times and I LOVE it.  I keep one jar in the bathroom to use as a moisturizer on my skin and hair and I keep one in the kitchen to cook with (although it's a little pricey to use as regular cooking oil).  It's great in oatmeal, on banana bread, or even crackers.  It tastes great and makes my skin glow.  I have recommended it to several friends.

The taste of coconut is not overwhelming. I either add it to my tea, coffee, or chicken. I have also taken a teaspoon by itself. I have not used it externally, but I hear the benefits are great as well.

My mom recommended coconut oil for daily usage and oh my, I am in love with this product.  I add it to everything.  It replaced butter, other oils, and cream cheese.  I have used it to bake, to sauté, on toast, in oatmeal, on salad.  It is absolutely Delicious!!!

This is a wonderful preshampoo conditioner or hair oil for african-american women. Apply a dime-sized amount into the hair after shampoo/conditioner process for soft,  chemical free hair. Use as a hot oil treatment before the shampoo process if hair is chemically relaxed. Great product!

Summary: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil - ALL PURPOSE SKINCARE
Text: Was shocked to discover that the oil is good for skin care.  Have used for tanning and basic moisturizer. Have discussed this product with several friends also discovering it is good for athlete's foot and mild skin abrasions.
I use this product in baking as well as as a skin moisterizer. It is great. my daughter even mentioned that I had a glow to my skin and at 52 that is nice to hear.

One of the best coconut oils I've tried. I love the scent, the taste & the texture. It is absolutely wonderful in baking products (especially chocolate cake!), and actually fries quite well, too.
This is one of the few oils that I can drink straight from the container (only in small amounts, though! lol!). It also mixes well with hot chocolate or tea.
The health benefits are terrific as well!

I would recommend this company and their Extra Virgin Coconut Oil to anyone. The product arrived at the direct time specified which is always a plus in my book. I love the way it smells and I use it to cook with as well as in my hair. I would definitely order from this company again and have recommended it to all of my friends that use Extra Virgin Coconut Oil as well.

Don't ever stop making this great product. I will be ordering some more really soon.......

Our daughter put us on to coconut oil.  She said to make sure we got organic and extra virgin.  So we did via Amazon.  It's great because you can heat it up and it doesn't break down like olive oil.  Amazon's great because they have free shipping and discounts if you order on a 6-month basis.

I had never tried this brand before, but I was looking for coconut oil, preferably organic, that was less expensive than I could find at local organic markets. Spectrum was too expensive, and I had tried Sunflower/Newflower's store brand but was not happy with it. This Nutiva is excellent, good aroma, good flavor, no off-tastes, and a very reasonable price. I will definitely be buying it again.

I have tried several coconut oils, and tried this one because it has one of the best prices I've found for organic coconut oil.  It turned out to be smooth, clean-tasting, and very mild.  Great for cooking and skin care.

I, too, improved my good cholesterol level with use of this product.  I use this in all my baking.  To substitute for butter, use about 3/4 of the amount of butter since there is no water in coconut oil, like butter has.  No noticable taste to me, but much better for your health.  I've also used it as a moisturizer on my face and hands.

Summary: Great product with terrible shipping and awful customer service
Text: The product is great, but I had a terrible experience with this item. The oil came out of the container during shipping and amazon refused to accept a return claiming that it's their policy. Great product but I will not buy it from Amazon anymore.

Oh my gosh....I've tried coconut oil before, but none of them have tasted as good as Nutiva. This is wonderful right out of the jar. I love using it instead of butter on toast (melts instantly) or spreading it on crisp bread. I will definitely be ordering this again and again. I am ordering a cookbook using coconut oil-can't wait to see what I can do with this.

It's just coconut oil.  I think I got two for $10 or $12, free shipping if you sign up for prime, you can always cancel later.  I use this to make vegan butter, mix about 1/2 (or slightly less) with olive oil, put it in your fridge.  You can also add lecithin if you have it available.  I only use it in the winter months to keep warm, it's too rich for warmer weather.
I love this product.  I have so many uses for it, I'm afraid I will have to order more often than I had originally planned.  Only thing, as Medusa (above) said, I also wish it came in a glass jar.

I've bought this in the past at my local organic store and it is a good product. The oil tastes like coconut and melts easily. I love using it in my cooking. If you're looking for a great tasting coconut oil, this is definitely it.

Summary: Great stuff, and smells nice too!
Text: I was pleasantly surprised how lightweight this oil is and how quickly it absorbs in to my skin.  I also cook with it a little and it isn't too strong, although I keep thinking I smell like a large macaroon after I rub this in to my hands and arms. (It fades in a few minutes)  I've started giving it to my very old and very finicky cat, who to my surprise and delight, enjoys licking it off my fingers after she eats her dinner.  Her digestion has improved and it helps her keep a little weight on.  I would definitely buy this again!

The Nutiva Organic Coconut Oil is one of the best, bar none! We use this product for our skin, hair, and separately in the kitchen.

We highly recommend reading: The Coconut Oil Miracle (Previously published as The Healing Miracle of Coconut Oil) and other books by the author, whom has founded a Coconut Research Center.

Summary: great product for dairy sensitive eaters
Text: This is the best coconut oil. We use it for skillet cooking and baking. It is a great alternative to things that call for butter as we have dairy allergies in our family. Much cheaper through amazon than in stores.
yummy on toast. frying bananas. great for my hands and lips.its more like butter, but you need less.
Excellent!  This is such a healthy alternative to butter. Love it.  I love it for a body cream as well.  I don't like to eat chemicals and preservatives or put them on my body so this is GREAT!

Summary: I would not be without my coconut oil.
Text:
I cook with it. It tolerates heat better than olive oil. For example: Heat two tablespoons of coconut oil in the skillet then add grated potatoes for hash browns. Cook covered till brown on the bottom side. Just serve them with the browned side up.

I use coconut for oil pulling. Swishing the oil around in my mouth for about 20 minutes. This helps rid the body of toxins. I use several times a week.

This oil is good for any skin problem. I put it on my cuts, burns, scars, etc. It heals the skin from the inside out.

I just love getting it automatically via mail from Amazon.

Thank you,
Sarah Jane

Well I want to first say that I am not using this for cooking purposes so I don't know if it is awesome for that or not.  But I do use it in my hair for hot oil treatments and sometimes I put just a tiny bit on when my hair is frizzy to soothe it.  I have mid-back length, curly, Caucasian hair and this stuff really hydrates and softens my hair. It doesn't make your hair look greasy or flat if you use only a little bit when you have some wild frizz.  For hot oil treatments I get my hair wet then use enough to saturate my hair.  After that I walk around the house with a towel on my head (so if I lean on the furniture it doesn't make it oily) until bedtime when I shower and wash it out.  So awesome!

I've received 3 shipments of this oil, and have had the same problem every time.  The oil is leaking out of the jar, as if it had melted, then it has congealed on the outside of the jar.  The jars are greasy with hunks of congealed coconut oil on the outside.  I like the oil but this leakage has me concerned.

Summary: Great Tasting, Healthy, Only Downfall is the Plastic Container
Text: Great tasting coconut oil that we use in curries or most everything really! Very healthy alternative to margarine, or other 'fake' spreads. I have never used it as a replacement for butter or anything but I hear it tastes very good. The only downfall I can think of is that it comes in a plastic container, but I am sure the price would be more if the company decided to switch to glass. All in all, its a great price for a good product. Will probably only purchase if very cheap and on special on Amazon, otherwise there are several other brands that come to mind that I will use more regularly due to glass jar like Tropical Traditions which tastes amazing and is my favourite coconut oil! :) But for the price I got it for I was happy.

I bought this coconut oil to use in making low-carb homemade chocolate, and it works great!  It has a nice coconut flavor that goes well with the cocoa I add.  The only surprise was that after opening one of the jars and leaving it in my pantry (it says no refrigeration is needed), the oil turned to an opaque jelly.  I still use it, and it seems to work great still, but it must be reacting with the air around it.  My other sealed jar is still 'oily'-looking and clear.  I think this would go great with stir-fries and sauteed tofu as well.
Love the oil and I normally get in Gallon Buckets to save money, but they are plastic.  Got these and they are plastic containers.

Summary: Instead of extra virgin olive oil try this
Text:
I read that Extra Virgin Coconut oil can be used for frying and as a substitute for butter in recipes. It is equal to extra virgin Olive Oil. Many Oils are unusable by those with cholesterol problems. Check the cholesterol content on all food labels.
This is the most inexpensive of the Extra Virgin Coconut Oils and you can fry anything with it as well as bake. I recommend this product.

I purchased two packs of the Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil and one of the two packs was not properly packed.  The product has leaked and the inside of the box and its contents were wet from the product.  The other pack was ok.

I had been using a different brand I was buying from a different supplier and thought I would try Nutiva Extra Virgin Coconut Oil. While I didn't want two tubs, I went ahead and bought it (price was reasonable) and traded one of the tubs for a quart of honey...back to product-- the oil is light and flavorful, I use it to cook with, everything from the frying pan to baking in the oven. Delicious!

Summary: Wonderful oil, FYI comes in  PLASTIC #1  container
Text:
I just discovered the many benefits on coconut oil and started using it for cooking and on mine and my kid's bodies after a bath instead of lotion...leaves skin super soft and with a very light coconut oil smell.
We just did food allergy testing on my son and he came back positive for milk (we suspected it) so now we use this oil as a spread on his waffles, bread, etc. in all recipes that call for butter and even add a little to my kid's smoothies.
*
*
*
Please note this comes in PLASTIC CONTAINER MADE OF PLASTIC #1 (botton of bottle has the little triangle with #1 inside and word PETE), most websites state this is a safe plastic (some argued otherwise but do your own research and decide for yourself), I won't argue that glass is better than any plastic but I'm just putting this as reference for anyone that's interested since I noticed all the bad reviews are due to this oil using a plastic container so if this is a big concern for you DON'T BUY IT!
I love the taste and smell of this product. However, I wish it came in a glass jar rather than a *cheap* plastic that may be leaching in the product.

Summary: great oil, smells awesome. the bottle its in is terrible though.
Text:
this oil is great. smells just like coconut -- you would expect to taste sweet coconut from smelling this, but it doesnt taste sweet at all, its just the essence of coconut flavor. great for shrimp and anything if youre not afraid of some coconut. i like that it hardens at moderately low temperatures. good way to make fake chocolate, with some cocoa powder n sugar. hardens in about 20 min in the freezer. tastes and feels very much like chocolate this way. great oil, high fat content, which is cool if you need to consume fat.

that said, the bottle they put this stuff in is horrible. both bottles i got felt all oily after first use -- and i was very careful taking it out. and they remained oily after i wiped them down thoroughly with paper towels. all my other bottled stuff stays clean n dry. i tested the bottle, shook it while completely sealed over my sink, and the stuff definitely comes out despite the twist on cap. thats the only thing i didnt like.

My new addiction:  peanut butter and coconut oil on toasted wholewheat bread.  It's yummy and healthy.  Also, coconut oil is a delicious change from olive oil in salad dressing.  Just melt it in the microwave--not too hot--and add garlic and lime juice.  Toss with lettuce and tomatoes and whatever else you like and you'll be oohing and ahhhhing.  I've also been using it on slaw.

My daughter told me about all the benefits of coconut oil and I decided to order this one from Amazon and try it out. So far, I have used it for (1) extremely dry skin on my face and around my hairline. I could see an improvement after just one day and it's continued until I no longer have patches of dry skin and the skin on my face is glowing. (2) I severely burnt my tongue tasting some soup and the next day it was so painful I could not eat. I coated my tongue several tiimes that day in the coconut oil and it was completely well on the third day. (3) On my grand daughters diaper rash and on her dry flaky feet. Her feet were peeling they were so dry and we cleared it up in a week with the coconut oil. (4) I coated my dry hair in the coconut oil and left it on all day and then shampooed it out before going to bed. My hair was soft and shiny the next day to the point that several people asked me what I had done to my hair. Now I regularly soak my hair in the oil and my hair is beautiful. (5) I made a face scrub with the oil and sugar and it works wonderfully for getting the dead skin off my face and feet at a fraction of the cost of the expensive scrubs and works better and smells good too.

The oil does not stay on your skin, it is absorbed quickly and does not stain your clothes or bedding. I ordered two tubs with Subscribe and Save and the price was a real bargain except my sister begged me out of one of my tubs, so now I have to re-order quickly. I don't want to be out. I keep a small jar of the oil on my desk and use it several times a day on my hands and elbows. Those rough ugly elbows will dissappear in a week and you will have smooth white elbows if you just rub some oil in once a day.

I have not used the oil for any kind of cooking because that is not the reason I wanted it, but I have read that it is great for use as a cooking oil. I know my grand daughter loves to stick her finger in the jar and lick the oil off. She loves it and I know it will not hurt her.

Would I order this again? Yes and yes. I would and have it on permanent order with Subscribe and Save. I don't want to ever be without it again.

This coconut oil is a great oil for the hair. I am a African-American women who is going natural and it really helps to soften up my new growth and hair. I would highly recommend this product for those who are looking for coconut to use for their hair.

I just received my coconut oil today and I must say it is wonderful. Right now I am eating a piece of natural whole wheat toast with this coconut oil slathered on drizzled with honey; what a sweet treat. This is my first time ordering coconut oil from this seller and it won't be my last. This coconut oil has a light coconut taste and smell, I for one felt I was taken a tropical ride to the islands. I also tried the coconut oil on my face, the very moment my package arrived and boy was I in for a shock! My face instantly felt smooth, moisturized, calm, and I believe it gave me an instant glow,plus I tried it in my hair it was instantly hydrated and shiny! Next, I am going to try this in my homemade banana nut bread, plus count less other foods. This coconut oil is indeed a winner; a winner for my body, skin, and anyone who dares to try it. I dare anyone to try this product and you will be happy you did. Much love and blessings to all who make this product!

Summary: Nutiva organic extra virgin coconut oil
Text: I am crazy for this product!!!!!  I know.  It sounds funny that a person would use this as you would vegetable or olive oil, but it is amazing.  I put a scoop in the pan and thought I would start slowly and try frying up some thin potato wedges to start and see what this oil was all about. It heated up quickly and the aroma was the beautiful smell of tropical coconuts.  My first concern after that was that the food would have a hint of coconut taste, but that was not the case at all.  The oil fried the potatoes perfectly.  I barely patted the potatoes. Didn't need to.  They were not greasy at all!!!!!!Nutiva organic coconut oil is my new favorite kitchen must have.  I am so impressed.

Summary: Excellent Product, The Best Oil You Can Use
Text:
The health benefits of coconut oil have been reported widely by now. I now live in a place where there are more coconuts than people, but I brought the Nutiva Coconut Oil down here with me, because it's almost 10 dollars for half a liter here.

I have found this brand to be the purest coconut oil on the market, at least among those I've been able to find and try. The price is fabulous, can't beat it.

The oil will solidify at lower temperatures, it did that often when I lived in Texas. You just scoop it out and use it the same way. Once it sits in a room temp over 70 degrees, it tends to stay clear and in its liquid form. It hasn't solidified at all since I've been in subtropical Mexico. It's not white when in liquid form.

I avoid all artificial fats and use coconut and extra virgen olive oil for most cooking and baking now. I have no problem with natural fats as I follow a mostly low-carb diet nowadays, but I still prefer non-animal sources for most fat. The fact that coconut oil has been shown to aid with lowering blood sugar is a big plus for me. I know a lot of people who stir it into their coffee or find other ways to ingest at least 3TB per day, I probably don't get that much, though I know I should.

Be aware that this oil doesn't taste much like coconut, important for me because I LOATHE the flavor of coconut. It does smell like it, but I haven't found that it adds any taste at all to what I cook.

A caveat: coconut oil has a smoke point that's about as low as olive oil, I believe it's 350 to 375 degrees, so this is not an oil that's suitable for deep-frying. You'll have to stick with peanut oil for that.

I've had the second jar open for about 5 months now on the counter and have not noticed any degradation of the smell or cooking results for this oil. It should last quite well when stored unopened, as well.

You can also use this as a moisturizer, I've tried it and it does leave my skin VERY soft.

Update: February 2012 I told my friend about how to use this product for cooking and how it was helpful for weight loss result - May 2012 she has lost 2 dress sizes and she has more energy. Before this she was not able to successfully lose the weight.

Nutiva Organic extra virgin (actually in the field of coconut oil there is no distinction between virgin and extra virgin like the grades of olive oil)is the best coconut oil brand for quality due to its true essence of coconut flavor. This is one of the very few companies that keep with the tradition of producing it cold pressed by hand which allows the oil to maintain all of its nutritional benefits. It's not an over powering oil. It has a clean, tropical, nutty scent and delicate flavor.

It is good for baking, sauteeing, frying, for smoothies, spreadable on bread/pancakes, great for creating frosting, and making dipping chocolate or added with chocolate for fondue, taken orally for weight loss, lip gloss, hot oil treatment for hair, hair dress, massage oil, skin moisturizer, nail/cuticle conditioner, make up remover, a combatant for vaginal/infections due to coconut's antiviral properties, used to moisten the inner nasal membrane to protect against dryness, and great (especially when combined with olive oil)for making bars of soap.

Coconut oil is extremely beneficial for your health because it has both short and medium chain fatty acids which promotes weight loss, increased metabolism, and healthy skin. Many experience the lowering of bad cholestorol while consuming.

It is the secret ingredient I use for sauteeing broccoli and cauliflower with a hint of ginger and nutmeg. I use it for salmon, lamb, chicken, eggs (yum), and it brings out such a dimension to food. I prefer it to butter and olive oil in cooking when I have it on hand. My cakes, brownies, quick breads turn out moister with coconut oil and rise better. Because it liquifies beyond 72degress F it may be necessary to combine coconut oil with a heavier fat (such as butter) when baking cookies.

Due to it's properties, coconut oil absorbs nicely into one's hair to soften it and combat frizziness. After trying other brands of coconut oil, none has compared to the remarkable pureness and flavor of Nutiva.

I haven't tried cooking with this oil yet. I use it for my hair mixed with shea butter or alone. I wish there was a more coconut smell, but this is how it smells naturally. I add a little coconut essential oil to help it out. Melts quickly, mixes well with other things and it's greasy feeling on the hair.

I recommend waiting until the price goes down to $15 and under, sometimes it goes up to over $20.

WHY WHY WHY are you discontinuing my shipments of coconut oil???? It says no longer available, yet I can REBUY it at twice the price???? This is ridiculous, unacceptable, and poor business practice!!!! Please reinstate the deal I got on this product. Love the oil....hate that you're ripping us off now!!!

I just heard about this product a few weeks ago. My wife and I are using it every day and have felt the difference. We also give it to our golden retriever and it has cleared up her yeast infection and her coat looks great. I used it on my dry scalp and that is gone now. It smells good but there is no taste of coconut. Give it a try,you will love it.

This is my favorite, hands-down, brand of coconut oil. I use it in cooking...fave is to melt some on a piece of foil, toss sweet potato fries or tots in it and bake then sprinkle on some coarse salt. Yum! I have also used this on my toddler's tush when it gets pink from food related sensitivities... it'll clear up overnight. I'll use it on my skin, my hair, anywhere! Taste great, smells great. A+
I bought this product to help condition my hair, and it works great!  As for cooking with it, have not tried it yet, but it does smell awesome!

This is my 3rd shipment that I received from Amazon and I have grown to love the product.  I use in on my skin and found that even when applied it does not leave your skin with a greasy residue.  It evaporates quickly but still keep your skin moisturized all day if applied right after showering. I purchased this product to moisturize the back area since I drive long distance every day.  It did the job by healing that troubled spot and with continuous use, the problem area is no longer there.  I also use this product in my natural thinning hair and I have found that my hair is becoming much thicker. I will continue to use this product as long as the price of the product does not increase dramatically.  I have also given away some of the product to family members who are requesting more from me.  To their surprise, I have told them that Amazon offers the best deal and they should purchase the product on this own.  Love it and will keep using it throughout the changing of the seasons.

This stuff "Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 15-Ounce Tubs (Pack of 2)" works for EVERYTHING!

You can cook with it, use it as a softener on your skin, put it in your hair as a conditioner, use it in place of butter on toast...the list goes on and on!

I say "try it, I'm positive you'll like it"!!! :)

"Product arrived quickly, packaged well. Love the taste- Fresh, clean. Used mostly as spread or topping, used few times for frying- fantastic! Have used another brand of oil (more expensive) and it seems to have less taste and Aroma.  Purchased this brand again, no hesitation. Good product, reliable seller/shipping."

I absolutely love this coconut oil. It is delicious in oatmeal and I even use it in my coffee (I used to use coconut creamer). I put some in a small jar and use it for moisturizer at night. My niece uses it instead of Desitin on my great-nephew.

Coconut oil is very good for you (internally and externally) and this particular coconut oil is highly recommended.

Summary: Clear skin after 30 years of acne
Text:
Don't overlook this product's antibacterial properties. I cringe when I think of the years I used antiseptic, drying cleansers on my skin for acne, when coconut oil cleared my skin and has kept it clear and healthy for almost a year. It is good for almost any kind of skin irritation, even for pets. It cleared up my cat's skin irritation from flea allergies, and we got to skip a trip to the vet.
Great to cook with too, or add to tea or oatmeal.

After doing ALOT of research I decided to purchase this Coconut Oil. I'm happy that I did. Thus far, i'm very happy with the purchase. Just a word of advice. If you are going to ingest the Coconut Oil, go to 'Youtube' and do a Search for 'Green Regimen'. This is a Green Smoothie video blog and I put my Coconut Oil in these Smoothies. It's working out GREATLY. Good Luck!!!
I don't use it for cooking but I use it for eye makeup remover, lotion on my body and also hair mask.
Great oil. Use it with eggs, stir fry, even in smoothies! Quick shipping. Buy it....coconut oil is super good for you!

I've gone through three little tubs of EVCO, now, and it's great. I use it in place of vegetable oils and butter (or part of the butter) in baking, and the results have been very tasty.

The coconut flavor is light but present, so that's something to keep in mind. Some people swear you can't taste the coconut, others say it overwhelming the base recipe. So far, in cakes, breads, and a few candies, the flavor has been complimentary. I like it.

As well, it is a tad sweet, so I adjust the sweetener in my recipes down a bit more than usual.

I live in a climate that is warm for most of the year, so the EVCO stays liquid. Though it is shelf-stable, it may be worth considering how you would need to store it, based on your climate, before you buy. This particular container size is very manageable to handle on the shelf, and it doesn't take up a lot of room in the fridge.

I'm really happy with this product. I plan to have it as a pantry staple for all of my baking.
This is a wonderful product for my new Paleo lifestyle.  Many coconut oils on the market, this one is superior!

Nutiva does not make a bad product. I eat a strict Paleo eating regimen coconut oil is all I use for baking; well sometimes Ghee. I brush coconut oil on chicken breasts, sprinkle some hemp seeds on top, a bit of black pepper and then bake. The coconut flavor is not overwhelming it just sneaks in there. I also use coconut oil when I saute my spinach; also adding black pepper and hemp seeds. I am finding this the new oil in my life I really enjoy it.

Summary: I use this instead of butter.
Text: I will admit I love coconut. This oil gives the slightest hint of coconut flavor. I use it to cook eggs and when I make rice. According to the newest medical information this oil is good for you.
LOVE THIS STUFF! SO MUCH HEALTHIER THAN COOKING WITH BUTTER. DELICIOUS. LOVE THE COCONUT AROMA. NOT TOO STRONG IN TASTE OR SMELL. ALSO GREAT FOR SKIN AND HAIR!

I love this product and use it on both my babies daily...
Great for dry skin and eczema
Smells great

I love this coconut oil! I use it for so many things. Baking, body lotion, make-up remover, instead of olive oil, to make hot tea..
Endless uses plus it is so healty!

Summary: It's now a staple for me
Text: I ordered this oil because I was looking for an organic cold pressed coconut oil and this fit the bill and had a lot of good reviews. I use this oil for my hair and skin and plan to try it for cooking which is why I bought a two pack - one for my bedroom and the other for the kitchen. I use this oil everyday and my first jar has lasted for months. I have used it instead of lotion and as a deep conditioner and a daily conditioner. My hair loves it and it creates nice shine and my skin loves it especially in winter time when its dry. I have already ordered a big jar in preparation for me running out since it is a staple for me now. I love that I am not rubbing chemicals on my body but a natural substance.
This oil is just awesome! You can cook with it and its great on the skin. it has many uses and the smell is mild not overpowering. I highly recommend it!

I bought this oil specifically for use in my soap making process. I wasn't looking to use it for cooking purposes. All I can say is that it smells nice. It made my soap more leathery with a nice under scent. I will appreciate a bigger jar. It might be economical getting it in a big jar or bottle.

I love coconut oil. I use it for keto cooking (go coconut oil chocolates!) and as a moisturizer on my body, face, and hair--basically everywhere. My skin is soooo soft and a few scars have faded even. I use it around my eyes and on my lips especially. Absorbs really fast unlike a lot of store processed body oil products! (Pure coconut oil is cheaper anyway!)

Maybe TMI but it also helps improves my digestion. Some coconut oils are odorless but this particular brand has a light and pleasant coconut smell. I love it and use it all the time.

product arrived extremely fast, i think < 2 days from when i placed my order
this was my first coconut oil purchase. i love that you get two smaller containers so you can leave one sealed.
fresh and light color. I do get a coconut smell but don't feel that it is a "strong" smell at all.
have used it to make stir fry veggies and it was very good!
also giving it to my cats to aid their coats and weight control (any info/suggestions on pet uses welcome!) =)

Love this product. I have an esophagus and stomach illness and can't use butter or margarine. This is a wonderful option. Works great with toast, baking, or pan frying. Has a very slight sweet taste. My husband says he notices no difference in taste.

Summary: Add to my smoothie every morning!
Text: Some coconut oils have distinct flavor. This one is light but very tasty. I add a tablespoon to my green smoothie for healthy fats and energy. I have been using for about a year now and have never been healthier!  My recipe. Coconut Water as the base, 2 cups spinach, TBSP Coconut Oil, TBSP Chia Seeds, TBSP Hemp Seeds for protein, some fruit like bananas or frozen berries etc. I also cook with it because it is the ONLY oil that can be heated to 350 without converting to trans fats.

I am in love with this product. It is awesome. I use it as a hair treatment and a moisturizer. Sometimes I'll put it in my hair after shampooing it, wrap it in plastic and leave it in overnite. Other times I just run a handful thru my hair at the end of the day and leave it on for a few hours and then wash it out. Either way, I end up with the softest and shiniest hair.

I also use it to moisturize my skin. Rub it on at night and wake up to soft, non greasy skin. Rub it on your legs in the shower and use it a shaving lotion. You wont believe how well it works.

Cant recommend this product enough. Its non greasy, works its way into your skin overnite and leaves no residue, and has just a slight, but pleasant smell.

Summary: This is it! Tastes good and smells good too!
Text:
Just felt compelled to chime in with others who praise this product. This coconut oil tastes good and smells good too. Might want to go to the Nutiva website and/or get educated on coconut oil in general to discover why this product is so unique/good. But that won't equate to excellent experience of actually using it.

ALL COCONUT OILS ARE NOT EQUAL! This is a superior brand & product for many reasons.

PS: I'm getting it from another retailer (sorry Amazon - still love you tho, please forgive)

We get Nutiva Organic EV coconut oil on a two month subscription. It's great. I like to mix a serving of pistachios, a serving of almonds, and a tbsp of oil together for a late evening treat. My wife makes a great low carb snack by heating equal parts oil, semisweet chocolate chips, and chopped nuts; puts them in cupcake molds and freezes. Delicious but remember coconut oil melts easily (I just pop the whole thing in my mouth).

We "subscribe and save" this item. Can't beat the price or convenience. We use it with cooking eggs, vegetables, chicken. I even put a little in my coffee! Really mild smell and taste. Not coconut-y at all.

I've become a CO fanatic and this is my third Nutiva shipment. This CO is of excellent quality, slightly coconutty taste but nothing overwhelming, arrives fast and is an incredible deal. If you don't know about the benes of CO- read up. I drink it in my coffee in the morning and it really helps with satiety and weight loss.
I think it has a great taste and seems to be a good price for the product, check it out.
Really like this stuff and very benificial. It does work well in oriental and certain dishes. It has a slightly sweet/coconut flavor that doesn't add to the flavor of some items .

Since I started cooking with coconut oil 2 months ago this is the first brand/variety I've purchased that actually smelled and tasted like coconuts. The smell is amazing. Nutty and warm. It does infuse the food you're cooking with it with a slight flavor of coconut too. I am so glad we bought the Pack of 2 because it it is a winner. Other brands we've bought before are Jarrow (also avialable on Amazon) and Spectrum (from the grocerty store). Jarrow is a good quality brand but it did not have the same smell or flavor as the Nutiva. Spectrum, I learned after I bought it, is not great quality.

I'm planning to use it to make my own "Magic Shell" chocolate topping for our annual homemade Labor Day ice cream.

I highly reccomend this product for use in the kitchen or for the body!
Perfect for a moisturizer, has spf 4. I use on my lips when they are chapped. & after shaving my legs use as well.

Delicious, smooth and tasty addition to many foods. Increasing research shows the medium chain triglycerides in coconut oil stimulates the thyroid and juices up the metabolism. So, if you love the taste of coconut this is the one to buy!!

Summary: Great Price on a great product!
Text: This is a great deal on this coconut oil. On autoship I pay about half what I would pay elsewhere for the same product.  I like to keep 2 jars on hand. One in the kitchen for cooking, and one in the bathroom because it is a great face and body moisturizer, and deep conditioner for hair. Only disappointment is that the jar is plastic and the product is not completely raw.

This is my third brand of raw/unfiltered (or extra virgin as it is called here...same thing), and i am very satisfied. It is cold pressed and high quality, so the flavor, consistency, and aroma are all very nice. The price is also excellent. Highly recommended.

If you are not yet familiar with the incredible health benefits of raw coconut oil, i urge you to run a quick online search...you'll never go back to canola or fake butter cooking sprays again.

I love this product!  It has done wonders for my skin, yes I use it on my skin.  As I have gotten older my skin has gotten very dry, baby oil did not even work.  My friend suggested I use Coconut oil, I was shocked at the end of the day my skin did not have that "ash" look.....I highly recommend this for use on your skin!

Summary: The only coconut oil I buy!
Text:
Nutvia Organic Coconut Oil is the only coconut oil I will buy. Period! It is smooth when melted (no bits of coconut in it like I've experienced with other brands), making it perfect for stir-frying veggies and meat, or cooking up some eggs. I keep one jar in the refrigerator when I need it in a solid state, and one on the counter for when I need a liquid. I also use this product in my hair and it is fantastic!

The fact that this product comes in a two-pack is very convenient and cost-savvy!
Using it for cooking, hair repair and skin moisturizer. Love the smell, really great! Good product and price.  Will purchase again.

Summary: Best coconut oil buy for your dollar
Text: I have ordered this product numerous times and will continue to do so. This is by far the best price for pure organic coconut oil. I use it for everything cooking, hair, nails and skin.

This is a very tasty coconut oil at a very good price.  I've bought several different brands of coconut oil at Healthfood Stores at a much inflated price that weren't nearly as good tasting.  This one has a fresh, delicate coconut taste that is even good on salads.  I use it to fry fish & chicken and to oil casserole dishes too.
It smells really good and works better than I expected for cooking. You can use this for many things. Great for hair, skin and cooking.
Great conditioner for hair dont use alot though it will get oily just a little goes a long way my daughters are mixed and it makes their hair super soft and shiny!

Our family uses this coconut oil for a ton of things: baking, popcorn, in our coffee, hair -frizz tammer, body lotion, zit reducer, mixed with other stuff for deo, face wash, strech mark reducer, lip balm...and on and on. The price is great, cheaper then non-organic stuff from local store and it smells great!

I just love this product!!! I really like the fact that it comes in a 2 pack, I use one for cooking and have labeled the other "NFC", not for cooking. This is my new beauty product. I use it nightly as my moisturizer and have noticed that my skin is softer and my lines are less noticable. Even though it's oil, it doesn't make me break out (I tend to have oily skin) and I have rosacea, so I like the fact that it's natural. I've also used it as a deep conditioner on my hair with positive results. The smell is intoxicating, but not overwhelming, reminds me of Hawaii. It's great on any body part that is dry, feet especially. I even got my Mom on board, who has overly sensitive skin and she really likes it as well. Very happy that I found Nutiva.
The price is reasonable, it was well packed, and the product overall is just great. The flavor is delicious, too -- not too strong, but truly tasty.

This is one of the easiest coconut oils to cook and bake with. The taste is not very strong so that you can cook non dessert like food with it as well.  I use it for almost everything. Food, skin, hair etc.

I bought this product for my hair because of other people's reviews.  My hair was brittle and looked horrible because I color it often and use a flat iron almost daily.  I started using this product and my hair looks youthful and shiny again.  I have paid hundreds of dollars on conditioners and nothing worked better than coconut oil.  Love the fact that you get two of these, its a great deal!
This is the absolute finest oil for baking...also great on the skin. Bye-bye, canola oil and genetically modified oils! Put me on automatic delivery !
Every morning, w/o fail, after washing my face, I apply this coconut oil from forehead to neck.  Love the way it feels on my skin.
This product has great flavor on toast, although I haven't tried cooking with it yet.  Just wish it would not melt at 76 degrees. I guess it's just a mental thing!

I bought this for the purpose of hair and skin care, but Oh My it smells so good I had to taste it. I don't know much about coconut recipes, but I'll consider learning in order to put this to more extensive use.

Like most of the other reviews state, you can use this product for just about anything. Cooking. Hair care. Skin care. The list goes on and on. It's also great to give to your fur-kids, of which I have 6. I use this in my baking to replace butter, shortening or margarine and you can't tell the difference. Love it!

Summary: Used to help repair my bad teeth and gums.
Text: After seeing a few youtube videos about oral care using this type of coconut paste I opted for this brand. It tastes good in the mouth and after swishing for 15 minutes each night it seems to have helped my gums feel better and brushing no longer hurts the gums. But I also changed a few things in my routine like using Sensodyne Pronamel tooth paste (big help) and the new Cinnamon Listerine Total care. - I have not used to oil/paste for cooking at all but I can see it being great for baking and using in sweets that call for oils. For oral care it takes about 1 minute to turn into an oil in your mouth and leaves your mouth tasting nice and sweet. So before romantic night of kissing I would highly recommend this paste prior to kissing! Just be sure you do not swallow this stuff as it is very high in fat but if you are constipated it will help "ease your troubles" if you do swallow some of it.
This coconut oil is the best.  It tolerates very high heat; great for stir fry and lends just a nice hint of coconut flavor!
This coconut oil is just perfect all around.  Very light coconut taste, high quality, really a healthful choice.  I will be using this oil for everything!

Love this brand... so very good for you.  Try on french toast, pancakes and the like.  Made Challah bread pudding with this instead of butter or other fat.  Absolutely wonderful. Finally, a bread pudding that nearly tops that of Craker Barrell resturants.

This came in 2 pretty big jars.  I opened one and it was completely white. After a week or so of using it, i saw small black patches of what looked like mold on the surface of the surface. So I scraped it off. But within a couple of days, it grew back. I thought it was disgusting. Didn't want to throw such expensive oil away though. So I refrigerated it.  When refrigerated, the oil is hard as a brick. It's really difficult to scrape out chucks for use.  I mostly use this for pan frying eggs, veggies, meats, toast, etc.

This brand of coconut oil is just great.  It has a light, fresh, creamy taste.  It is great for cooking or can be used in place of butter on bread, veges, or for anything you might use butter.  From what I have read, there are really good health benefits from coconut oil also.  I have not used any other brands of coconut oil, but see no reason to try others because this one is so good.

After doing an exhaustive amount of research on Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, I set out to find the best product at the best price. My search was over once I found this brand here on Amazon AND discounted on their regular rotation price! I am very pleased with the product quality. Shipping is fast and well packaged. I'm a happy customer. :)
It's very good, not as strong of coconut flavor and taste as I would like but it will do. I prefer it on toast but it tastes good on popcorn too.

I wanted to omit dairy from my diet, but the question was what to replace butter with. This is the perfect alternative especially if you like coconut. I use it in the kitchen in place of butter and I love the taste. You cannot go wrong with this product.

This oil is great! I use it for my skin and my hair.  You can even cook with this...amazing! It gives a good buttery taste to foods. Can't say enough good things about this wonderful oil. Nutiva coconut is the best.

I have never cooked with coconut oil before, but after reading the great reviews on this product, decided to subscribe to it on "Subscribe & Save" here on Amazon. Received my first shipment, and today cracked open a jar for the first time to cook some homemade lamb patties.

Oh, my goodness. The oil spread very evenly over the skillet, almost in a gel-like manner--unlike oil. The kitchen took on such a wonderful smell because of the mixture of the cooking meat with the coconut oil. The patties cooked evenly and beautifully because none of them were on a "bare spot" on the skillet. And it didn't take very much to create this culinary heaven!! I may have used three-quarters of a teaspoon for four patties.

In short: I'm SOLD!

If heaven has a smell... This is it!  Fresh, fresh, fresh!  I purchased this for it's beauty benefits.  I plaster it on face at night and wake with soft, radiant skin.  I even use it on my 3 1/2 year old and 7 1/2 month old daughters eczema....works great!  I have not used in cooking as of yet...but intend to try it soon.  Really happy with this oil.

I love that I get two containers.  I use one in the kitchen for my smoothies, and just to have a scoop every day..  The other tub goes in my bathroom.  I use it in my hair, and on my skin, and especially around my eyes..  Just turned 39 and still NOT one wrinkle.  :)  WONDERFUL stuff.. Everyone should have it.

I originally purchased this product for my hair but I think I prefer to use it in my food better than the results I got from using it in my hair. It is in a tub jar so you would need to scoop it out with a spoon. I like that is stays solid until you put it in your hands or on your food then it starts to melt. The smell is delicious and it isn't overwhelming. For my hair it was soft but I felt as though it weighed my hair down even after washing it afterward. For my food, it gave a subtle coconut taste and was delicious and not to greasy. I love that it is organic and is extra virgin coconut. Definitely worth trying.

I really like this c oil. It has a great taste, but no greasy aftertaste. Tonight I cooked fish filets in it. They tasted much better than other oils like olive or sunflower oils.
Packaging was great, no leakage at all. The paper and plastic membrane was very tightly fastened to the rim of the jar. I was a bit surprised that an organic c oil would be put into a plastic jar. Next time I will find a comparable product in glass jars. Although if that is not possible I would buy Nutiva c oil again.

I love this coconut oil! And the price was great, plus the free shipping made it even better!
Take a chance on this healthy oil, you won't be disappointed.

Summary: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Text: I am putting coconut Oil in my hot oatmeal each morning and using it when popping pop corn and cooking vegetables etc. etc.  I love it.

Summary: Great quality, versatile product, LOVE IT!!!!
Text: I use it not only for cooking, but also I made my own lotion (olive oil, bee-wax and coconut oil, vitamin E)...perfect. The food tastes good and my skin looks great. All natural, no chemicals. Great product, very versatile at a great price.
I use this stuff from cooking to skin care. its the best. i love that it comes with two packs so i can use one for skin care and one for cooking.

This product is good for many uses.  We use it to cook with, as lip balm, as body lotion, and as massage oil.  It smells great and leaves your skin soft and silky.  It absorbs quickly and does not leave a greasy film on your skin like other oils can.

I love coconut oil... and this brand is excellent.  It works really well in place of butter: on toast, in baked goods (cookies turn out extra crispy!), for pan frying, etc.  It is great with high heat frying.  It tastes amazing!  It is also really good as a "lotion" believe it or not.  Smells nice on the skin, absorbs well, and skin is super soft.  A little goes a long way too!  This price is fantastic.  Subscribe and save is a good value with fast shipping.  Thanks Amazon!

Summary: We will continue to use & order
Text: We are absolutely happy with this product. Use it in our morning oatmeal. Our toast tastes better & is healthier when using this instead of butter. Have just noticed so much difference in our skin & hair. We have used for about 3 months. ... truly love the Coconot oil.

Summary: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil
Text: This product is not only good as a skin softener, but as a substitute for oil or butter when cooking.

I've been using this for a while for cooking and as a moisturizer, but ever actually tasted it out of the jar. Now that coconut oil has been shown to improve cognitive and other issues, my parents have been eating the stuff. I've been buying them Nutiva for a while, but the other week my father came across another brand...and they both HATED the taste of it! Thank goodness my two jars of 54 oz. Nutiva from Amazon arrived two days later!

My cats have been enjoying little treats of Nutiva, as well =^.^=

So excited when this arrived earlier this week and been using it every day. Just knowing this is an healthier alternative makes it a great deal but I love all the different ways you can use it. My one fave thing is to put a teaspoon of it in my morning oatmeal! This is so delicious and healthy! So many other uses you will fine and it is just the right subtle taste of coconut and smells great! Don't be afraid to try it in stir fry or whatever you want to do. Experiment! Bon appetite!
I love this coconut oil! It tastes good and stays fresh in my cupboard in the container. It is exactly what I wanted and works beautifully for my family.

We love this coconut oil so much we have it on autoship and have no plans to stop (barring changes in pricing or quality). We take it by the spoonful, add it to smoothies, and use it forr recipes such as dehydrating granola and chips.
The taste is smooth and clean.
The consistency is even and good quality.
The containers are opaque (though the larger ones are not) -this is important to reduce rancidity.
They arrive with no leaks and are a great size for every day use.

Highly recommend this brand in this size.

Summary: a healthier fat for baking and frying and it tastes great too!
Text: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil can easily be a healthier replacement in your baking and frying recipes. Mono fats like olive and coconut are healthier fats than even sunflower, vegetable, and canola oils, however olive oil doesn't tolerate the higher heats for frying/pan frying and some people don't like the way it tastes in baked goods.  Coconut oil doesn't contribute to slowing of the thyroid like vegetable oils can and tolerates the higher heats of frying that olive oils can't.  It imparts a light tasty coconutty flavor to baked goods.  I just wish it came in more user friendly packaging.  Convenient 1/2 cup portions within a larger container for instance would be great.

I use coconut oil for cooking (healthier than other oils) and for my hair and sometimes for skin. Great to always have a pot of coconut oil

Author of 30 Minute Meals Recipes includes Easy Dinner Recipes, Healthy Dinner Ideas and Simple Recipes that can be made in 30 Minutes or Less for Busy Moms, ... Discover 30 minute meals for busy families! and Healthy Eating Tips: Learn how to Eat Healthy in only 33 Steps!

Been experimenting with Coconut Oil. The Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin is very nice with barley a hint of coconut taste. Been using it mostly to cook eggs and it does much better than the vegetable oil it replaced.

One side effect of taking this oil in teaspoon+ quantities a day is that I sleep much warmer at night. It could be placebo or some other factor but I almost immediately noticed this effect this winter.

I would buy this product again, though it would be nice to pay about half. Might go for a larger quantity next time.

I have just begun to discover all the amazing uses for coconut oil and its' incredible health benefits.  Google it and you will be amazed!  I knew that I only wanted to use Organic & Extra Virgin coconut oil.  I did a price comparison and this was the best price anywhere especially when I signed up for "Subscribe & Save".  The smell is wonderful.  I now use it daily as my face lotion and anywhere my skin is dry.  When my 6 year old was diagnosed with Eczema, I used coconut oil instead of the prescription and it went away in a few days.  It is also fantastic for cooking and baking.  I use it as a butter substitution.  I know that it costs more then vegetable oil or butter but the health benefits outweigh the price for me.  I have purchased it in a glass jar in a grocery store and wish that it came shipped to me in a glass jar instead of plastic so it would not be exposed to the toxins in the plastic.  Highly recommended!!!

My friend had been going on and on about how great coconut oil is so I figured I'd give it a try.I ordered the 2-pack a while back and now I use it everywhere-In my hair, my kids hair, to cook with. I have read that coconut oil is good to help you lose weight so I put a tablespoon in pasta when I'm cooking it and mix it all up. You don't taste the coconut but it does enhance the flavor of whatever I'm cooking. On my skin,The scent is a little strong so I normally put this on at night. It really gives you that 'glossy' magazine-ready look though. I love it.

My first experience with Coconut Oil. I used it to fry up Tilapia. OMG. I felt like I was in a five star restaurant! Delicious! Fried Bananas for dessert and you'll find yourself in Hawaii. I need a recipe book or go on line to find other applications for it.  So, it's GREAT and good for you?  Unbelievable wonder.  Doesn't require a lot either....I wonder if cheaper brands are just as good as Nutiva was excellent but pricey.
Great product, quick shipment, great price. I love love love coconut oil and it's quite pricey. I should have purchased more and keep them stocked I use it on my hair, skin

I was very happy with this coconut oil. Will buy from seller again. The price was great as well. This was my first time using coconut oil and I'm glad I didn't have to waste money experimenting with other brands, this one was a win and I will be purchasing it again. Thank you!

Summary: Great product at a great price
Text: I am new to coconut oil....the cost is what kept me from trying it sooner.  This is the best deal I've ever run across and the product is excellent!
My husband and I discovered the uses of coconut oil about 2 years ago and we use it everyday.  We use it for mainly topical application and this brand is by far the smoothest we have used.

Summary: The best offer for coconut oil
Text:
I used to buy Spectrum, but that was before I discovered the joy and advantages of Amazon shopping. I tried Nutiva and ever since this is the only coconut oil I use. It tastes great and I can get it for a good deal on Amazon. The main advantage over the other brands is the container shape. It makes it so much easier to get the coconut oil out... unlike the standard jars.

I cook pretty much everything with it - sauteed asparagus or other veggies, I use it for baking or spread it on grilled cheese sandwiches - AMAZING!!

I also use it as a mask for my hair or for my dry skin.
I love the milder flavor of this coconut oil.  Wonderful product, arrived on time and love to use it on my toast and in our popcorn.

i have used this product, nutiva organic extra virgin coconut oil, for about 8 months now...and i have to say that, 1. it has a high heat resistance so my foods don't burn (not like olive oil which has a low resistance to heat), 2. the taste with my foods is exceptional, and 3. it is really REALLY good for you...coconut oil is expensive but i find it lasts me for a long time...about a month for a 29 fl.oz. though i use it for just me, one person. i also dribble it on my pets foods for their health and their coats...i use my oil every day....and i feel great! a very good product !!!Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 29-Ounce Jars (Pack of 2)

Wasn't sure if this coconut oil would pass the tests but it did. It's organic, extra virgin, cold pressed, not refined or deodorized or bleached. After my first order, I reordered the larger size and am getting it auto shipped from now on. I have started using this to replace all but olive oil and flaxseed oil so am glad that it comes in various sizes. I already use it for a moisturizer and if I ever need a bug repellant, I am going to use this. It's what they use in Panama for the skeeters and cheetras(no see ums).

A friend of mine recommended this.  I use it on my daughters hair as a scalp moisturizer.  The oil makes its way down the shaft of her hair leaving it shiny but not heavy.  I live in south florida and because of the temperature the oil is rarely solid so I keep it in an applicator bottle.  I will be a customer for life.  Oh yeah, I keep a little bit in the kitchen for cooking.  Great Flavor.

I have been using coconut oil as a substitute for cooking oils and skin/ hair products for years. This is a stellar brand- it is organic, cold pressed, and made for safe storing. There is a lot fo good info on the web about how coconut oil is saving our health. Jump on the band wagon. It is not too late.

Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil has a great taste and has many beneficial uses.  You can use it to cook, bake, and as skin care.  You can also use it for oil pulling!!  This is def. one of the best tasting coconut oils on the market.  I def. recommend Nutiva =)!

This oil is not as opaque as pictured. I made delicious coconut ice cream first. Then I tried it on toast and it didn't really taste like anything. I will use this item when coconut flavor is required in baking.

This item really shone when it was used for frying Indian spices. The spices for once did not burn and the fragrance was amazing. It is a true flavor enhancer.

gme

Summary: Product was bad but customer service was excellent
Text:
On 9/9/2011 I order the above product. My daughter and I recently started the Atkins diet, heard wonderful things about it and decided to give it a try. The first jar was wonderful! Creamy, aromatic, flavorful...absolutely devine. I opened the second jar at the beginning of this week and what a disappointment. I'm not sure if the ingredients are cooked but the oil has a burnt horrid taste to it. Before we realized it, we had made a batch of carb-free chocolate candy with cream cheese and coconut frosting, a huge batch of chicken fried in the oil and a huge batch of faux-potatoes using the oil. We had to throw everything away. The taste was atrocious. Everything had a burnt and bitter taste to it. I'm extremely disappointed and according to my 15 year old daughter, they need to hire better quality control employees.

I have to post an update to this review because I've been working with a customer service rep today and he has provided fantastic service. He is shipping me, for free, a replacement product as well as some additional free products. I am also sending the remaining jar back to the company, at no cost to me, for additional research.

I used to cook with coconut oil years ago, but gave it up when the "experts" said it was bad for your health. I started cooking with "healthier" alternatives--like artificial sweeteners and chemical-loaded, aerosol-powered, partially hydrogenated cooking sprays--also on the advice of the experts.  My food tasted like a tin can, my skin was an oily mess, I felt sluggish all the time, and my jeans hugged me ever more tightly. Thankfully, the conventional wisdom has come full circle, and I've spent the last few years making the grateful journey back to a more natural--and genuinely healthy--way of living. I looked for a good, organic coconut oil at our regular grocer with no luck, so I was glad to find this brand here on Amazon.  I'll agree with some of the other reviewers that say this oil has a "toasty" scent.  It does, and that's why I like it.  Its warm, toasty aroma actually smells a little buttery--which is perfect if you're using this as a substitute for butter or margarine.  I've tried other oils that have a more coconut-y aroma, and they also had a sweeter, pronounced fruit-oil flavor that's great for desserts and dressings--but clashed with meats and savory dishes. This coconut oil and EVOO now get nearly equal time in my day-to-day cooking, and the warm "toastiness" of this oil adds a richness that enhances other flavors. I can't see it working in place of butter on something like toast or popcorn, but cooking with it gives a noticeably buttery taste to foods. This came in a pack of two tubs, which is convenient since this oil has so many uses. I can have one in the fridge to keep it solid for cosmetic/medicinal use, and the other in the cabinet as an ever-ready liquid for cooking. I'm once again enjoying all the benefits of virgin coconut oil--health, nutrition, beauty, and flavor all in one jar. These containers are fairly small, so if you use this as one of your staple oils, you may want to get a bigger size.

Summary: Yummy for skin, and your palate!
Text:
(I thought I had reviewed this product already, but perhaps it was under a different size? Oh, well)

With apologies for possible redundancy, I will simply say that this stuff is fantastic.

Other reviewers have written about the "clean" taste, and I can say that after tasting this product, I wholeheartedly agree. It just tastes fresh.

And it melts in your hand. And tastes terrific in food.

It DOES have a delicious fresh scent, but make no mistake, it does NOT smell like suntan oil. If you wear it on your skin, you will not smell like the stuff that comes in a brown bottle. It actually fades relatively quickly, but no one will accuse you of rolling around in coconuts.

Same goes for putting in food. I think it adds a nice depth and nuttiness, and is yummy in popcorn, as some have stated. But it is absolute HEAVEN in your fried brekkie potatoes.

Think it is also worth mentioning that to the lower ratings reviewers, I think that ordering this product in the cooler months has merit. If it becomes liquid at 75-ish degrees, I can see that it would be easy for this stuff to leak, despite what appears to be the best efforts on the part of the manufacturer when it comes to the packaging.

Finally, I think that the 15 oz size is fine if you are going to be using this product for topical use only, but if you plan on cooking with it as well, I would recommend getting a larger size-

Can't wait to use this during the summer, and show off my glowing skin!

Hope this helps!

This is the first time I have ever used coconut oil and I love it!

I first tried cooking with it--I used one tablespoon in the pan, added onion, garlic, mushrooms and peppers. I usually use EVOO so I was a bit worried about the taste difference. It defininely smells like coconut, but surprisingly, it is not overly strong. The taste was pleasant with my veggies. First try: delicious and easy.

Next, I put some on my face as a moisturizer. Again, the smell was pleasant and mild. In the past I have also used EVOO on my skin because it is a milder moisturizer than a store bought facial moisturizer. EVOO takes hours and hours to soak in, so I only use it at night before bed. I thought the coconut oil would be similar. I put in on in the evening and sat down to watch a movie. It was completely absorbed before I even hit the sheets! And by the time it was absorbed, the smell was gone (not that the smell of coconut on the skin would be a bad thing!) So it is lovely as a facial moisturizer.

Then I read on the label that it could be used in place of butter, so I spread some on a cracker and tried it that way. It was delicious! I love the oily texture--similar to butter, with the coconut taste. So it is a wonderful substitute for butter.

I am sure I will find more uses for this incredible product and I can't wait to try it again.

Summary: Delicious and good for you, it can't get any better than this!
Text:
I bought this coconut oil based solely on other great customer reviews and believe me when I tell you how happy I am that I did! I am 39 years old and at the age where health is something that is starting to become very important to me, as I am starting to see more and more friends and school mates with various health issues.. I have never had any health complaints and have decided to be proactive about health matters, instead of trying to "fix" them as they come along (as long as I'm able, of course). So, in my hours and hours of reading, I came across so many articles, websites and books devoted to coconut oil. I was shocked, that I have never heard of it and I have still not met anyone who uses it.

So, I decided I had to try it! The main reason was I read that eating 2-4 teaspoons a day had health benefits, but I have also came across my fair share of home spa recipes for moisturizers using coconut oil as one of there main ingredients. I figured, I couldn't go wrong buying it, because if it didn't taste nice, I could still use it. I'm very happy to report that I was blown away by the taste of this coconut oil! It is not sweet at all but the coconut oil was so reminiscent of a Almond Joy candy bar to me, that I find myself going back for another spoon just to enjoy the delicious flavor.. I'm afraid I'm going to have to reorder more to use in my moisturizer recipes, as I intend to use these two containers to cook with now that I am hooked on this fantastic product.! I would recommend this coconut oil to everyone because of it's many health benefits and versatility of use (You can spread it on your toast it tastes so great or cook with it as you would any cooking oil, as well as use it on your skin. Google Coconut oil moisturizer recipes, cooking recipes and also health benefits for yourself as well as the health benefits for your dogs if you have pets. You will be amazed at all the interesting information on the web about coconut oil))! Unless you truly dislike coconuts I think you will find, like me, that you now have a new favorite oil!

I have to admit I'm floored by this product.  I'm originally from the West Indies so needless to say I love coconut.  I've tried other extra virgin coconut oils and wasn't impressed, they tasted and smelled more like vegetable oil than anything, and forget about trying them straight.  I was very skeptical about Nutiva but reading some good reviews and being hounded by my vegetarian friend who swears by it, I said what the hell.  It arrived from Amazon and it was in liquid form, which was to be expected as it's 96' in the shade here in Florida.  I removed the lid off the jar and before I even took the seal off, I was entranced by this wondeful coconut fragrance.  I stuck my finger in and even in liquid form, I was tasting nothing but melted coconut.  Later, when it turned into solid form I tried it again, a dap on a teaspoon, once again, nothing but coconut.  Definitely will buy this coconut oil again.  Nutiva did a great job of impressing an Islander ;)
We love this coconut oil.  We use it for cooking and for body care.  It smells like coconut unlike some other brands.  The only change I would love is for it to come in a glass bottle.

I love the smell of coconut! However, I must say, I assumed that coconuts were naturally sugary. Well....i was WRONG! There is no sugar taste to this stuff at all! It does have a very strong smell of coconut though, and not much flavor to it.

I bought this stuff because of some Candida overgrowth issues I've had recently been dealing with (which was caused by too many antibiotics given to me by my doctor) and also for a new found minor eczema problem (probably caused by the Candida overgrowth).

So basically I eat and rub this stuff on me all day. Lol.

I love the added taste it gives to coffee or tea. It says it can be used as a 'buttery spread on bread' but I can't imagine actually substituting butter for this stuff.

I have yet to cook with it, but I'm sure it will work fine.

My stomach problems I've been having have seemed to have cleared up.

As far as the eczema, it seems to be helping a bit, but not as quickly as Dermarest Eczema lotion did.

Dermarest Eczema Medicated Lotion 4 fl oz (118 ml)

I still find myself scratching a bit, but not nearly as much as before and redness or bumps are gone. However, I am still going to keep using this for my eczema because it is more natural way of clearing it up. After using the Dermarest lotion a few days my heart started pumping slow and hard.

One more thing I should mention (why I gave this product 4 stars instead of 5) is because I keep forgetting that this stuff melts once it reaches 76 degrees. I inadvertently opened the jar on an angle one day thinking the coconut was still solid and the oil spilled out everywhere!! Definately my own fault, but the jar itself doesn't seem to be the best thing for containing such an oily liquid when it melts. This still would not stop me from purchasing this specific brand though, just don't be an idiot like me and you will be fine.

I would definitely recommend this brand as I've seen others in stores and they cost about 12 for 1 jar. Amazon had 2 jars for 12. Can't beat that! +++

This is my first time experimenting with coconut oil and I am very pleased. I've used it in cookies and brownies and they have turned out amazing. I would that that when I make cookies, I melt the oil instead of creaming it with the sugar like you would butter.

I've used it on my hand when they dry and crack and it works very well and smells wonderful.

I've also used the oil for a stir-fry and in some basmati rice and both turned out wonderfully.

0 Cholesterol is an added bonus to the wonderful taste it adds to dishes.
Great coconut oil to use in cooking, baking, and even as a snack (grab a spoon and go!). Will definitely order it again!

I love, love, love this coconut oil! I haven't used it much to sauté or anything like that, but I use it in my breads, muffins, pancakes, etc.

But that's not all, this stuff has so many wonderful uses!!!! I use it as a hot oil treatment for my hair and I use it topically to treat blemishes. I've heard of many other uses, from lotion to deodorant. As I continue my journey of a healthier lifestyle, I look forward to further investigating it's many uses.

The only thing I would change is the packaging.....a glass jar would be really nice!

As far as shipping goes, I live in Hawaii and have not had any problems with leakage or spilling during transport.

My daughter-in-law told me about this coconut oil. I was pleased with the quality of the product and the speed of its arrival. The price is much better than in the health food stores. Automatic shipping cuts down extra trips to the store, as well.

I've been buying this two-pack of unrefined coconut oil for my family the last couple of years. Great quality, taste and value. If I were to purchase at a local natural food store, I'd pay at least $3 more for the same amount of the same product.

We use coconut oil for all of our cooking due to the MFAs and high heat point. It takes the place of butter as a sandwich spread and in most our baking. I also use it (just a touch!) as a hair product for my twin toddlers and a moisturizer for our skin.

I HIGHLY recommend. =)

This coconut oil is absolutely wonderful. I ordered it so that I can make low cholesterol baked goods for my dad, but now i'm using it for myself as well, it's so delicious. I love the subtle coconut flavor!
Hey , this is some great tasting stuff ! Also love to cook with it , and it's way healthier than margarine or butter ! Will be using from now on .

This oil is a solid at room temp but quickly melts over low heat and cooks at a low temp better than olive oil.  The flavor is also somewhat sweet and very different from olive oil.  We like it!  We purchased two packs of 2.

Summary: Coconut oil is the healthy option
Text: Coconut oil is the healthiest oil you can cook with.  This brand tastes great and has a light flavor that doesn't obscure the taste of the food that's being cooked.  Highly recommended.

Love using this coconut oil as a replacement for butter on toast, pancakes, sweetpotatoes, in oatmeal, cream of wheat, and a lot of other foods. I keep extra tub in bathroom to use on skin. It's a great product that's also good for you.

Very satisfied with this product,use it a lot in place of butter, it adds a very different flavor but taste great. A friend tried it the other day on her toast and loved it so she wants to get some too.

Summary: Tastes great and excellent for cooking
Text: I use this coconut oil for cooking and I love it! Great coconut taste that enhances all my dishes. Love that it comes in a 2-pack so I always have a backup. A++

I was buying this exact product at my local GNC for what I'm paying here for 2 of them. Can't beat that great deal! This stuff is so healthy, and helps me tons with my weight loss after having my baby. I'll be a customer for life!

I have tried several brands of coconut oil, and this is so far my favorite.  It has a delightful flavor and consistency.  I like it for cooking, baking, skin lotion, and straight from the jar on a spoon.  It is a great quality as well, and a great price.  I will definitely continue to buy this product!

Besides being just plain tasty, a small addition of Nutiva coconut oil to my daily diet lowered my triglycerides and "bad" cholesterol. It also ended nightly coughing from what my doctor diagnosed as gastric reflux. Better coconut oil than prescription proton inhibitors that leach calcium from your bones!

I've used Nutiva coconut oil to cook with for a couple of years now. Their prices are hard to beat when on sale and make this wonderful healthy oil a staple in our house now. I have decided that I like this smaller size over the larger tubs (jar-like) of theirs I've bought in the past since it makes getting the oil out easier. This 2-tub package is a great deal, especially when combined with subscribe and save.
I ordered the Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil and love it!  I use it on my skin and hair as a daily moisturizer. It's not greasy and it feels great for massages.

I've recently become a fan of coconut oil and think this is one of the best kinds I've tried. Love to use it on homemade popcorn and in baking. I appreciate that it is organic and cold-pressed as well. Highly recommend.
I liked the price and the oil is better quality than the organic store-bought oil. It seems to be lighter and the wide opening is superior to a narrower jar.

I use this coconut oil on a daily basis and currently do the subscribe and save option so I never run out. I use it to cook all of my meals. It has a very subtle coconut flavor and coats the pan better than olive oil ever could. It does burn and can withstand the highest of temperatures. It is great because it can also be used as a moisturizer, it make my skin very soft. There are so many health benefits to using coconut oil. I am loyal to Nutiva!

I love, love, love this product. I use it for my hair, skin, cook with it and even use for massages.  Its organic, cold pressed, virgin which is the best grade you can get.  The price is very reasonable.  I bought the two container option. I keep one in the bathroom and one in the kitchen. I put a little in a small, reusable container so I can keep in my purse.  Don't want to be without it.

Summary: Nutiva Coconut Oil is a Multi-purpose product!
Text: Nutiva is the cleanest Coconut Oil I have ever purchased... It is the best for top of the stove cooking, and greasing or oiling cookie sheets and pie pans... Adds an excellent taste to chicken stir fry... or cooking pancakes, the flavor is great....  The best part is that get some on your hands?  Don't wipe it off, put it on your hands, face, arms or legs, or a treatment for your hair, just prior to washing... what a little container for a versatile product.. buy it,  you will be amazed!

I've been using this brand of coconut oil for over a year and I love it.  I've tried other brands but none of them were as good. I like this 15 ounce size better because you can use it up before it gets rancid. I had a much larger container before but it turned before I used it all up, we live in a hot climate so this is a great size to insure it stays fresh. I use one jar as a cosmetic on my skin and hair and we cook and bake with the other jar and use it in smoothies. It tastes great and is wonderful for baking when you want a little coconut flavor substitute it for the oil in the recipe. Great for curry and sambal recipes. Just know that it solidifies if it gets cold so as a salad oil it's not good because it gets hard when it hits cold food. It will do this when used as a marinade on cold seafood or meat but thats a good thing in that case because it stays hardened on the food till you get it on the grill and then it melts into it making it really tasty! There are too many uses to list and now that we know that coconut oil is a healthy oil there is no more guilt. I highly recommend this great oil.

This coconut oil is amazing. I use it for cooking, making homemade deodorant, making homemade body wash, as a butter substitute, on popcorn, on bread.... its just amazing. It smells delicious and tastes SO good. And the subscribe and save price makes it a really great deal :)
PS for those who havent used coconut oil, it is solid at below 75 degrees (so pretty much room temperature). It is super easy to melt tho... even just putting it between your fingers will turn it into liquid :)
An excellent product.  I bought this as a trial item to see whether this will be good. Nutiva is really good. Since we make Virgin coconut oil at home, its for sure the oil is good.

ProfileName: Donna's Reviews "I Love Shopping on Amazon!"
Text: I like cooking with different flavors...this is great...Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 15-Ounce Tubs (Pack of 2)....I now have found it in my local grocery....
I use this stuff for my hair and skin.  It makes my hair shiny and soft.  Makes my skin smooth and soft, but a little sticky.  Smells good, but I haven't tried eating it yet.

Summary: Great for eczema lotion and cooking oil!
Text: I've been using coconut oil to soothe my baby's eczema, as well as using it as my primary cooking oil! Wonderful, healthy, healing fat!
Convenient packaging!  Easy to use as coconut oil has to be heated (in warm water) to be in a liquid state and I just put this container in a bowl of hot tap water.  Stores well too!

I love this coconut oil.  I use it for popping popcorn.  It has a wonderful subtle coconut flavor and stands up to the high heat needed for popping corn - or any other high heat cooking.  It is solid at room temperature.  It also works well as a body oil.  I cut off a chunk and use it to rub on my skin before a shower.

Coconut oil is really great for my skin, especially on my eczema.
I am just disappointed that one of the tubs was opened and exposed.

Not sure if I am buying this product from Amazon again...
